## Logistic Regression - an example

dfNFL = read.csv("../Data/NFL.csv")

##

```{r }
fit = glm(Win ~ TODiff, family=binomial(link="logit"), data=dfNFL)
library(boot)
curve(inv.logit(coef(fit)[1] + coef(fit)[2]*x), add=TRUE)
abline(h=0.5)
```
